pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generate Raster Images from QuadKey-Identified Datasets // A set of functions of increasing complexity allows users to (1) convert QuadKey-identified datasets, based on 'Microsoft's Bing Maps Tile System', into Simple Features data frames, (2) transform Simple Features data frames into rasters, and (3) process multiple 'Meta' ('Facebook') QuadKey-identified human mobility files directly into raster files. For more details, see DAndrea et al. (2024) doi:10.21105/joss.06500.
